definition: a screening for a select audience in advance of release for the general public, to watch a movie or play before it is released to the general public
details:
noun
- a screening for a select audience in advance of release for the general public
= example: a screening for a select audience in advance of release for the general public
- an advertisement consisting of short scenes from a motion picture that will appear in the near future
= example: an advertisement consisting of short scenes from a motion picture that will appear in the near future
= synonyms: trailer
verb
- to watch a movie or play before it is released to the general public
= example: to watch a movie or play before it is released to the general public
